thread.title: Police seek man accused of exposing himself to 2 women
thread.title_full: Police seek man accused of exposing himself to 2 women | OregonLive.com

author: The Associated Press
title: Police seek man accused of exposing himself to 2 women
text:
CORVALLIS â€” Corvallis police are investigating two separate incidents in which a man exposed himself to a woman.
Police said in a news release the first incident happened Monday afternoon when a man who was naked except for shoes approached a young woman in a parking lot. The woman told police she ran away.
On Tuesday afternoon, police say a man matching the same description followed a young woman home from the Oregon State University campus. The woman went into her home but police say she later saw the naked man masturbating across the street.
The woman called friends who came to the house and photographed him. He then left on a longboard, which is a longer version of a skateboard.
Anyone with information about the incidents is asked to call Corvallis police at 541-766-6924 or 541-766-6911.
-- The Associated Press
